Class LocationTemplate

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.xmlload.ObjectTemplate
      cz.ive.xmlload.LocationTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Template, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphLocationTemplate, GridLocationTemplate
public abstract class LocationTemplate
extends ObjectTemplate

Common parent for all templates used to instantiate locations
